translations: v．懒洋洋地躺或靠：以懒散、舒适的姿势躺或靠在某处。
· He lolls on the sofa all day.
他整天懒洋洋地躺在沙发上。

sentences.sentence: He lolls around in an armchair; his wife does the washing-up.
sentences.translation: 他懒洋洋地坐在扶手椅上；而他妻子则在洗碗碟。

sentences.sentence: Looking every bit the baritonea male bearded seal lolls in the sun.
sentences.translation: 我们仔细看看这“男中音” ——这只长着胡须的雄海豹懒洋洋地躺在太阳底下。

sentences.sentence: She lolls on the sofa and lulls herself with mulled beer or by mulling over how to make a mull of all dolls that dare to loll their heads on the shoulders of her sterling darling.
sentences.translation: 她闲躺在沙发上，而藉加料温啤酒来给自己催眠，或藉熟思如何搞垮所有那些美娃们，那些美娃胆敢把头闲靠在她真正的爱人的肩膀上。
